Package org.freehep.postscript.viewer

Stand-Alone PostScript level 2 Interpreter, which can be used as pre-viewer in an application or as an applet in a webpage.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RefreshListener  
 

Class Summary
BufferedApplet This class extends JApplet by adding double buffering.
BufferedPanel This class extends JPanel by adding double buffering.
DebugTransformGraphics2D Prints out changes to the Transform
DelegateGraphics2D Delegates all calls (except create) to hostGraphics.
FixedTexturePaint Texture Paint for PostScript Processor
FontCache This class keeps a reference to all physical fonts.
PSApplet PostScript Applet for PostScript Processor,
PSPanel PostScript Panel for PostScript Processor,
PSViewer PS Viewer
 

Package org.freehep.postscript.viewer Description

Stand-Alone PostScript level 2 Interpreter, which can be used as pre-viewer in an application or as an applet in a webpage.
